info.name: Remember The Milk - RTM - Sleek & Fluid (CSS3)
info.description: I've made a redesign of Remember the Milk (RTM), with fluid CSS and some improvements, hope you like it! Any feedback would be apreciated, I will be updating it frequently.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.1
Added RTM shortcuts (based on http://userstyles.org/styles/1623/remember-the-milk-display-keyboard-shortcuts). Thanks miksmi!

v1.0
